unpublishedAction.name: All_details

actionConfiguration.body:
select retailer_code,
contact,
status,
license_days,
amc,
ideal_days-license_days as need_update,
stop_date,
(stop_date::date - now()::date) AS stop_days

from retailer where (stop_date::date - now()::date) <= {{Input1.text?Input1.text:0}}
and status like {{Input2.text+'%'}}
order by stop_days

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
